Key Match Events: Ja Morant scored 26 points with 10 rebounds and 14 assists
Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 37 points and grabbed 11 rebounds
Damian Lillard was held to four points on 1-of-12 shooting
Brook Lopez scored 12 points for Milwaukee
Seven Grizzlies players, including all five starters, scored in double figures
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant: 'I just came out being aggressive, took what the defence gave me'
Ja Morant: 'Everybody was kind of in a good rhythm, we got it going early'

Ja Morant: 'We got stops. We were boxing out, we were getting out running, playing our game. That's how we want to play. If we want to do something in this league, that's what we've got to do each and every night.'
Bucks coach Doc Rivers: 'I thought we played with the right spirit. We didn't make shots and you're going to have nights like that. But on those nights we have to find a way to get stops.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks are clearly missing the contribution of injured Khris Middleton, who has yet to play this season as he recovers from an ankle injury
